name: Space Hit
description: On SPACE HIT you finished your space mission, and it's just time to come back home, but your journey will not be so easy as you think, what would be a simple journey to home, Will be your biggest and hardest challenge, not being able to fly free through the space, you will need to jump from planet to planet,destroying your enemies and overcoming obstacles, until get your last objective, come back to earth planet.
